channel.title: Naked Drinking coffee in your kitchen
channel.description:
So i was watching the news and this guy got arrested for drinking coffee naked in his kitchen
Source [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TYwpHMAKZpo&feature=rec-HM-fresh+div]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TYwpHMAKZpo&feature=rec-HM-fresh+div[/url] Theamazingatheist's Thoughts : [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QaE0uathXJA]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QaE0uathXJA[/url]
Your thoughts? This is what i heard from theamazingatheist This kids mom and the kid was walking threw HIS yard and yeah its there fault shouldn't of been in his yard
So discuss
UPDATE: so i found another video Link :[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8q1Nk9Rf_AU&feature=video_response]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8q1Nk9Rf_AU&feature=video_response[/url] Up to a year in prison and a 2K fine for a bitch trespassing?

item.title: Naked Drinking coffee in your kitchen
item.dc:creator: @mr_arrows95 bansil
item.description:
@mr_arrows95 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:28, topic:311299”][quote author=mr arrows95 link=topic=407741.msg3012416#msg3012416 date=1256874118]

Maybe if you live in the city and want to be naked in your house you should put up some blinds or curtains?
[/quote]it really dident say where he lived but i think he lives in the suburbs because of the yard most city’s Dont have yards

‘suburbs’ is still the city to me. I’m not saying the guy should have got arrested first thing, but if people have a chance of seeing you, you should get blinds or curtains.[/quote]Well it was a fenced yard it looked like And they shouldn’t of been tress passing anyway.

Read full topic

Maybe if you live in the city and want to be naked in your house you should put up some blinds or curtains?
[/quote]it really dident say where he lived but i think he lives in the suburbs because of the yard most city’s Dont have yards[/quote]

‘suburbs’ is still the city to me. I’m not saying the guy should have got arrested first thing, but if people have a chance of seeing you, you should get blinds or curtains.

item.title: Naked Drinking coffee in your kitchen
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

I’d understand it if they’d fine him if he was standing in front of a window that can be seen from the street. EDIT: of course a window that is big and without curtains. The windows in this case force the viewer to focus on the naked person to actually see him. But if someone trespasses and because of that he/she can see you naked the only fine that should be given is one for trespassing.

its wasnt in street WAS IN HIS GARDEN MMKAY?

Read full topic
